content:
I don't have access to real-time information, but i can tell you that several of the festivals i mentioned are generally held annually around the same time each year. 

for instance, the budapest international folklore festival is typically held in august, and the világfa folk dance festival is usually held in early july. the matyóföld festival usually takes place in late august, while the busó festival is held in late february or early march, during the carnival season. 

it's always best to check the official websites of these festivals to confirm the exact dates and plan your trip accordingly. keep in mind that some festivals may have been postponed or canceled due to the covid-19 pandemic, so it's essential to check the latest updates before making any travel plans.
